column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Met a friend here for dinner while I was in town.  First of all
column2: it's much bigger than it looks from the outside.  Inside has a dark
column4: and the food was delicious.  We shared a whole bunch of things
column5: and every one of them was very well executed.  I'm a fan of tapas in general
column6: and would definitely recommend this place.
